I don't think it's physically possible to OD on weed
There are some complications that can happen. Mostly affects folks that are multiple times daily users.
Something like 5% have adverse affects including nausia, anxiety, and a complete loss of appetite.
It basically becomes the exact opposite of what weed normally does.
Pops found out the hard way when he retired and suddenly became a smoker again and just went ham on the dispensary.
Dude lost a dangerous amount of weight in a very short period of time, eventually had to go to the hospital.
